graph_title: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
indicator_name: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
page_content: Canada has comprehensive birth registration systems in place. It is a legal requirement to register all births in Canada. Registrations do not fall under federal jurisdiction, but under provincial and territorial Vital Statistics Acts. There is no direct measure of number of children who are unregistered. As registration is comprehensive, a figure of 100% is used. More information on provincial and territorial vital statistics can be found at Member organisations - Vital Statistics Council for Canada.
SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.9: By 2030, provide legal identity for all, including birth registration
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.9.1: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.9: By 2030, provide legal identity for all, including birth registration
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 16.9.1: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD), United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEFF)

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 16 : Promouvoir l’avènement de sociétés pacifiques et inclusives aux fins du développement durable, assurer l’accès de tous à la justice et mettre en place, à tous les niveaux, des institutions efficaces, responsables et ouvertes à tous
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 16.9 : D’ici à 2030, garantir à tous une identité juridique, notamment grâce à l’enregistrement des naissances
